body:
Fixes #17680 

This PR adds a simple example-based test that takes an `hdf5` file through the dump, copy, and diff commands.

This PR has been tested against the following version(s):  1.8.10, 1.8.16, 1.10.1, 1.10.6, and 1.12.0.

TODO:
- [x] Install and run the tests against additional versions of the software
title: Smoke test: Add test of a sequence of hdf5 commands
